documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Privacy Policy

 

Last updated on June 26, 2018

 

 


      . Faycoo, L.L.C, CowProxy,Ininja of social networks ("CowProxy","Ininja", "we", or "us") is the owner of the website nilcdn.bid ("Site"), CowProxy,Ininja software ("Programs") and all related services, content (content ) and the proposed applications (further - "Services").

 

(CowProxy is a new free VPN service that provides faster access to web sites and allowing "inhabitants" of the network to use various services and examine the content blocked on a regional basis.)

 

We care about Your trust and has developed this privacy Policy to help You decide whether to use our Services.

This agreement is a legally binding agreement between you ("You", or "User") and us. Getting access to the Services and using them, providing information to us in other formats, You agree and accept the terms of this privacy Policy, make it timely amended, and consent to the collection and use of information in the manner described in this document.

We recommend You to carefully read this privacy Policy and periodically refer to her, understanding her and vnesennye any subsequent changes to it.

If you do not agree with the terms of this agreement, please immediately discontinue use of our Services and, therefore, remove them.

Unless otherwise stated, this privacy Policy, the definitions in the License agreement end user CowProxy.

In addition to this Policy, please read our License Agreement, which is hereby incorporated by reference, as well as with other rules about which we can periodically notify you.

 

 

What information do we collect?

 

When You use our Services, we collect from You the following data types:

Anonymous information. We collect information about your use of our Services for three reasons:

- Firstly, in order that we could provide them and improve them, Services;

- Secondly, in order to ensure security;

- Thirdly, for the audit and statistical tracking of the demand for our Services, for the audit of our branches and the calculation of payments to third parties.

 

 

These data do not identify individuals. they include only Your approximate geolocation, equipment specifications, type and browser version, date of software installation and use of our Services, operating system type, version and language, registry entries, the addresses of Your URL requests with the appropriate timestamps.

We make no effort to using this information to identify Your identity.
Anonymous information we can gather helps us to identify, in order to avoid additional queries, do you use Your computer at the moment.

 

  • Personal information. This is information of a private or sensitive, confidential nature that identifies you or can identify you.

 

We collect and store Your personal information, including your IP address, name and Your e-mail address - if You provide us with this information (when, for example, open an account or contact us via the option "contacts"). And also - the name of the screen, payment and payment details (for example, if you purchase premium Services), other necessary for the provision of Services, the information we from time to time may request.

You can create an account for the Services using your credentials for a particular website of a third party (an"Account of third parties") such as Facebook®. This will allow you to link your account with a third party.

If you select this option, a pop-up window appears for the third-party account, the further advancement of which you will need to approve.

It will describe the types of information that we will get.

This information includes Your personal information stored in Your account third party, such as User name, email address, photograph, date of birth, gender, and preferences.

Any anonymous information, directly related to some personal information, is considered by us as personal, as long as there is such a connection.

 

  • Other information. Is going to speed up browsing and because of the nature of the Service. access to the information you have accessed, accessible to other Users, publicly available. can be accessed from a cached copy of data from your device.

 

Please note that when You interact with other web sites and use the CowProxy, these other web sites may collect information about You.
CowProxy has nothing to do with the methods of data collection such web sites, our practice of data collection is governed by its own privacy Policy.

 

 

Why we collect Your information?

 

All the detailed information we collect above is collected to provide you with better services.

Anonymous information is collected for research and statistical purposes, which allows us to continue to develop, customize and improve the Services based on Your preferences, usage and interactions with our Services, and to provide You with the most relevant additional Services and offers.

In addition, the model of our company is designed in such a way that the Services are rendered by third-party services, introduced to provide analytical functions.

Your personal information is collected for several purposes: first, it allows us to provide You with the best user interface and most appropriate options, functions, opportunities, offers, marketing materials. Second, it allows us to provide You with technical support and respond to Your questions and concerns.

 

 

How we collect Your information?

 

In addition to using the information that you provide yourself (by registering or contacting us), we use various technologies to collect and store information, such as cookies, pixel tags, web beacons and system log files.

 

  • Cookies (Cookies - "biscuits", "cookies", "cookies") is a small data file that is sent to Your browser with the purpose of keeping account. it allows the website to recognize You upon return.

 

We use cookies to store your registration information and to recognize you when using the Services.

We also use them to help us and our partners when setting up, adapting content, placement experiences and advertising, we present to You on Internet sites. For example, when You open the web page, us, our Service providers or partners automatically set a cookie to recognise Your browser when navigating in the Internet to provide You with information and advertising according to Your apparent interests.

Are also used Cookie session IDs to activate specific service functions, which allows us to better understand how You interact with the Services and to monitor aggregate usage and routing Internet traffic on the Services.

When you exit the Services and close your browser, session cookies from Your computer are deleted.
Independently for their own purposes, these files can place on Your browser and its third party providers or advertisers.
You can always make your own choices, to accept or not to accept these cookies or delete them from Your browser. But, if You delete "cookies", some Services may become unavailable to You.

 

  • Pixel tags: this technology is placed in combination with cookies to track activity on websites.

 

  • Web beacons: A method used to track who reads a web page or e-mail, when and from which computer.

 

  • Log data: when you use the Services, our servers automatically record this.

 

The data log may contain such information about the device, as Your IP address, browser type, visited pages and time spent on them, data on access to date, time, the unique identifier generated for Your device (i.e. if You have service with your mobile phone, the identifier may be just, his room).

We use this data in a generalized form and do not combine it with personal information.


The information we share

 

In accordance with this privacy Policy, we will not share Your personal information with third parties without Your consent, unless required by applicable law or court order.

 

We do this only when it is necessary to create, provide, maintain, optimize the Services. Moreover, third parties can access your anonymous information only in a certain amount necessary to provide the Services.

Personal data can be transferred to third parties for additional purposes - marketing, research, analytical.

 


As well as - in special cases where there are serious grounds to believe that it is necessary to:
1) comply with law, regulation, subpoena or court order.
2) detect, prevent, or otherwise addressing fraud, security, violation of our rules, policies or technical work.
3) ensure compliance with the provisions of this privacy Policy and other agreements between You and us, including investigation of potential violations.
4) protect the rights, property, or safety for us, partners, affiliates, subsidiaries, users or the public.

 

Are we in direct marketing?

 

If we have Your email address, with the purpose of providing You news and marketing offers can share it with our partners or use it yourself.

Out of respect for Your right to privacy, we provide You a simple way to receive email from us, from our affiliates and partners.

 

By clicking on the "unsubscribe" link at the bottom of any message that we send you, you can refuse to receive commercial and advertising messages at any time. It may take up to 10 days to process this request.

Even if you have canceled the subscription to receive advertising messages, we can send you important postal communications of other types without offering the possibility to refuse to receive them. Where can include customer service announcements, administrative notices, surveys, surveys.

 

 

Please note that changing information in Your account or opting out of receiving promotional emails will only affect messages from us.
If, before You changed settings or updated the information we have already provided Your information to a third party (e.g., sponsor, or partner), You may have to reconsider Your preferences directly with that third party.

 

 

Protection of information about children

 

Our Services are not intended for children under thirteen years of age.
We do not knowingly collect or demand personal information from persons under thirteen years of age. If You are under thirteen, You should not register or provide personal information through the Services.
We delete personal information from our systems, if it becomes known that the User has not reached the age of thirteen.

 

If You are a parent or guardian of a child who, in Your opinion, revealed some private information, contact us at cow-app-help@hotmail.com so we can delete that data from our systems.
If You believe that we might have any information from a child under the age of thirteen, please contact us by e-mail at cow-app-help@hotmail.com.

 

 

Security and privacy

 

The collection and processing of personal data and anonymous information aimed at providing You Services and sending of commercial information regarding products and services that we believe may be of interest to You.
We will store this information until it is needed for these purposes and in accordance with legal or ethical requirements.

 

To prevent misuse and data leakage, we use information on industry standard tools and security measures, as well as internal procedures and strict principles of leadership.
Access to information our employees and contractors are in accordance with the obligations of confidentiality.

 

We use measures and procedures that significantly reduces the risk of data misuse, but cannot guarantee that our systems will be completely secure. If You become aware of any violation of the data breach or vulnerability in relation to security, You should contact us immediately.
We use all necessary measures to investigate the incident, including preventive.


Your Choice

 

We value Your trust and Your control over personal information.
Therefore, if You wish to review your personal information or delete it - let us know. You can send us an email at cow-app-help@hotmail.com.

At any time You can stop us or a third party to gather data about You.
May require review or change, edit the saved private information.

Also, you may not accept cookies associated with our Services or third-party services. To opt out of using Google cookies, you can visit the Google Ads Settings settings. However, it should be noted that if your cookies are disabled, then many Services - partially or completely - can stop functioning properly.

 

If You live in California, USA, or European Union, you can send us a written request regarding a list of categories of personal information we may have disclosed or provided to third parties, as well as information about the third party.
To exercise this right, please contact us at: cow-app-help@hotmail.com.

 

 

Disclaimer of Warranties

 

Despite anything else in this Policy, we are not responsible for the accuracy, correctness and security of information we collect, store, and disclose to You or anyone else.

 

Change of ownership

 

If we change the ownership or control over the entire CowProxy or its part, including by acquiring, merging or selling the company, we have the right to transfer the personal and anonymous information stored in our systems, in whole or in part.

We must acknowledge that in the event of bankruptcy, insolvency or liquidation, we will not be able to control the use and transfer of Your personal data.

 

 

Changes to this privacy Policy

 

This Policy can be periodically reviewed at our discretion, so please check it regularly.

The last revision will be reflected in the header "Last updated". Any change to this Policy is published on the Website.

Your continued use of the Services after making such changes will be considered as acceptance of the amended Privacy Policy.

 

 

How to contact us

 

If You believe that Your privacy has not been processed in accordance with our privacy Policy or that your privacy has been violated, compromised, by any person in the course of using the Services, please contact CowProxy at: cow.gococo@gmail.com and our staff will promptly conduct a formal investigation of the compliance of privacy.
